name: Leliane Nunes de Barros
content: Leliane Nunes de Barros Leliane Nunes de Barros Professora Livre Docente Departamento de Ciência da Computação Instituto de Matemática e Estatística Universidade de São Paulo Associate Professor Computer Science Department Institute of Mathematics and Statistics University of São Paulo PhD in Electrical Engineering at the University of São Paulo (partially done at the University of Maryland at College Park, USA). Master in Computer Science at the University of São Paulo, Mathematics and Computer Science Institute of São Carlos. Research Groups LIAMF  - Laboratório de Lógica Inteligência Artificial e Métodos Formais Logics, Artificial Intelligence and Formal Methods Laboratory (CNPq Group) Planning, Cognitive Robotics and Applications Research Group Computer based Learning Research Group Artificial Intelligence in Education Main Research Area AI Planning and Cognitive Robotics Research Interests AI Planning Planning and Scheduling Planning in Cognitive Robotics Abductive Event Calculus Planning Library of Problem Solving Methods Knowledge Management and Knowledge Engineering Semantic Web Artificial Intelligence in Education. Research Projects FAPESP Robótica Cognitiva IBM Eclipse Plugin: ProPAT - Tutor Inteligente baseado em Padrões Pedagógicos FAPESP CCC-AHIA - Cooperação e Compartilhamento de Conhecimento entre Agentes Heterogêneos Inteligentes e Autônomos BIBO Intelligent Search Based on Ontologies NSF-CNPq Mappel - Multi-agent, Collaborative and Adversarial, Perception, Planning, Execution and Learning CNPq Laboratório de Ensino de Inteligência Artificial - Projeto de Iniciação Científica GeometrITS - Inteligent Tutoring System for Descriptive Geometry Teaching 2005 MAC 5700 - Seminários em Ciência da Computação - 1o.
